name: BioRenew Hydrate Coconut Milk Shampoo
description: Moisturize and protect hair from damage with Herbal Essences Coconut Milk Shampoo.

name: BioRenew Hydrate Coconut Milk Conditioner
description: Deeply moisturize and protect hair from damage with Herbal Essences Coconut Milk Conditioner.

name: Moisture Co-Wash Whipped Cleansing Conditioner
description: This daily shampoo and conditioner gently cleanses and corrects porosity, leaving hair internally and externally balanced.This light crème conditioner gently moisturizes, balances and detangles.

name: Fructis Style Smooth Blow Dry Anti-Frizz Cream
description: Want to achieve beautiful smooth blowouts, at home? Smooth Blow Dry Anti-Frizz Cream helps you master your blowouts: easy, smooth and long-lasting.

name: Inforcer Brush Proof Anti-Breakage Detangling Spray
description: Reduce breakage while brushing with Inforcer Brush Proof spray. Compatible with all hair types, the spray detangles difficult knots and leaves coveted smoothness.

name: Densifique Bodifying Shampoo
description: A gentle but thorough cleanser that leaves hair with more substance, resilience, and strength.

name: Densifique Bodifying Conditioner
description: A daily conditioner that helps restore hair’s volume, shine, and resilience.

name: Royal Oils Deep Moisture Masque
description: This deeply moisturizing formula provides long-lasting scalp protection while restoring hair moisture, leaving hair feeling soft and looking beautiful.

name: Refresh Dry Shampoo Foam
description: Kenra Platinum Refresh Dry Shampoo Foam is a versatile cleansing foam that can erase excess product and absorb oils with a powderless feel for a clean slate.

name: Whole Blends Oat Delicacy Gentle Detangling Hair Milk
description: Our gentle formula blooms with the powdery-soft fragrance of Oat Milk & Rice Cream, bringing to life our wholesome, nourishing care for weightless hair.

name: Well Behaved Anti-Frizz Cream Serum
description: Well Behaved™ Anti-Frizz Cream Serum smooths the cuticle and treats split ends for soft, silky, healthier-looking hair. Use as a treatment on wet hair to detangle, reduce breakage and counteract future damage.

name: Advanced Hairstyle Blow Dry It Quick Dry Primer Spray
description: A rich, protective and controlling hair oil Developed with KeraShapeTechnology that actively interacts with hair's structure Contains precious Keratin and Silk Proteins to transform dry and damaged hair.

name: SuperPlump Thickening Blow Dry Spray
description: Amp up fine hair with this heat-activated, body builder that weightlessly plumps each strand to expand volume and density while smoothing for touchably soft, noticeably thicker hair with color and heat protection.

name: Prêt-à-Powder
description: Soft, fine dry shampoo powder that instantly absorbs oil and refreshes styles while adding texture and volume.
